sentences.english: I also sometimes just enjoy eating hummus on toast or a cracker.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也喜欢吃带有鹰嘴豆泥的烤面包和饼干。

sentences.english: Just iceberg lettuce , half a cup of garbanzos and a lemon wedge.
sentences.chinese: 卷心莴苣，半杯鹰嘴豆，夹一个柠檬。

sentences.english: Our famous hummus, marinated eggplant, tomato.
sentences.chinese: 鹰嘴豆酱，炸茄子，西红柿。

sentences.english: Chickpea protein is considered as a complete protein.
sentences.chinese: 鹰嘴豆蛋白属完全蛋白质。

sentences.english: While the chickpeas cook, prepare the couscous according to package directions.
sentences.chinese: 同时也要煮鹰嘴豆，根据包装说明蒸粗麦粉。

sentences.english: Throw on some chickpeas for additional texture.
sentences.chinese: 撒上一些鹰嘴豆，作为外加的材料。

sentences.english: Snacks during the day include blended fruit smoothies or peppers dipped in hummus.
sentences.chinese: 白天的零食包括水果冰沙，或者辣椒蘸鹰嘴豆泥。

sentences.english: The king prawns arrived with red-pepper hummus and vanished rapidly off the plate.
sentences.chinese: 国王带着虾红辣椒鹰嘴豆和迅速消失了盘子里。

sentences.english: Indian – Channa Masala and lots of other stuff.
sentences.chinese: 印度的鹰嘴豆，还有其它很多的东西。

sentences.english: Serve broccoli and chickpeas with tahini sauce drizzled over the top.
sentences.chinese: 在西兰花和鹰嘴豆上面淋上芝麻酱调料。

sentences.english: We even have a Hummus restaurant now in Ambrose.
sentences.chinese: 现在在阿姆布罗斯我们还有一个鹰嘴豆泥餐馆。

sentences.english: Hummus with cucumber and tomato slices on whole wheat pita
sentences.chinese: 鹰嘴豆沙加黄瓜，全麦皮塔饼配上西红柿切片。

sentences.english: Our home made hummus topped with minced lamb meat and pine nuts.
sentences.chinese: 我们自制的鹰嘴豆酱搭配羊肉末和松子。

sentences.english: Chickpea is a kind of bean crops with rich nutritional value.
sentences.chinese: 鹰嘴豆是一种营养价值丰富的豆类作物。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
